adventuresystem.alreadyjoined.message: You have already joined the adventure!

adventuresystem.completed.no.win.message: The adventure ended! There are no survivors.

adventuresystem.completed.win.total.message: The adventure ended with $1 survivor(s) and $2 death(s).

adventuresystem.join.bettoohigh.message: You can not join with $1, the maximum is $2.

adventuresystem.join.bettoolow.message: You can not join with $1, the minimum is $2.

adventuresystem.join.needpoints.message: You can not join with $1, you only have $2.

adventuresystem.join.success.message: You have joined the adventure with $1!

adventuresystem.payoutwhisper.message: Adventure completed, $1 + $2 has been added to your balance.

adventuresystem.reset.message: The adventure has now cooled off! Use "!adventure [$1]" to start a new adventure!

adventuresystem.start.success.message: $1 is trying get a team together for some serious adventure business! Use "!adventure [$2]" to join in!

adventuresystem.stories.1.chapter.1.message: Your memory is vague, on the table a small laptop is playing a video: "My name is The Architect. The bank of Karabraxos is the most secure bank in the universe. You will rob the bank of Karabraxos!"

adventuresystem.stories.1.chapter.2.message: Unable to leave their minds blank, (caught) slowly feel their mind being drained as The Teller feeds on their thoughts.

adventuresystem.stories.1.chapter.3.message: We find ourselves back in the room we started in as consciousness of (survivors) slowly fades again, only to wake up in our beds like nothing at all has happened.

adventuresystem.stories.2.chapter.1.message: Friends! I've got coordinates for a secret stash of bolts, hidden away within the bowels of the elven forest. We should shoe up and give this a go!

adventuresystem.stories.2.chapter.2.message: Look out, bear traps! (caught) got their legs ripped off!

adventuresystem.stories.2.chapter.3.message: Dayum, that was a close call for losing a leg. But you've deserved this (survivors)!

adventuresystem.stories.3.chapter.1.message: Ah, my dear friends! I may have found the adventure of a lifetime. Namely the house of count Dracula is believed to be the bolts master! I'm for going now!

adventuresystem.stories.3.chapter.3.message: That was a close call, I don't think I've been bitten. you? Ow well, (survivors), here's your share! ~Transforms into a bat and flutters off~

adventuresystem.stories.4.chapter.1.message: I think we have a much bigger threat on our hands than the cave in... It is half man, half bear, half pig... Don't Laugh, I'M SUPER CEREAL!

adventuresystem.stories.4.chapter.2.message: /me As the adventurers work their way through the tunnels they hear a soft noise from behind them...

adventuresystem.stories.4.chapter.3.message: Look out! It's ManBearPig! (caught) get dragged off into the darkness.

adventuresystem.stories.4.chapter.4.message: (survivors) run away. Let's get out of here guys! We can't deal with this alone

adventuresystem.top5.empty.message: There haven't been any adventure winners recorded yet.
